name: Master ball
description: The best BALL that catches a POKéMON without fail.

name: Ultra ball
description: A better BALL with a higher catch rate than a GREAT BALL.

name: Great ball
description: A good BALL with a higher catch rate than a POKé BALL.

name: Poké ball
description: A tool used for catching wild POKéMON.

name: Safari ball
description: A special BALL that is used only in the SAFARI ZONE.

name: Net ball
description: A BALL that works well on WATER- and BUG-type POKéMON.

name: Dive ball
description: A BALL that works better on POKéMON on the ocean floor.

name: Nest ball
description: A BALL that works better on weaker POKéMON.

name: Repeat ball
description: A BALL that works better on POKéMON caught before.

name: Timer ball
description: More effective as more turns are taken in battle.

name: Luxury ball
description: A cozy BALL that makes POKéMON more friendly.

name: Premier ball
description: A rare BALL made in commemoration of some event.

name: Dusk ball
description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch wild Pokémon at night or in dark places like caves.

name: Heal ball
description: A remedial Poké Ball that restores the caught Pokémon’s HP and eliminates any status problem.

name: Quick ball
description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that provides a better catch rate if it is used at the start of a wild encounter.

name: Cherish ball
description: A quite rare Poké Ball that has been specially crafted to commemorate an occasion of some sort.

name: Potion
description: Restores the HP of a POKéMON by 20 points.

name: Antidote
description: Heals a poisoned POKéMON.

name: Burn heal
description: Heals POKéMON of a burn.

name: Ice heal
description: Defrosts a frozen POKéMON.

name: Awakening
description: Awakens a sleeping POKéMON.

name: Paralyze heal
description: Heals a paralyzed POKéMON.

name: Full restore
description: Fully restores the HP and status of a POKéMON.

name: Max potion
description: Fully restores the HP of a POKéMON.

name: Hyper potion
description: Restores the HP of a POKéMON by 200 points.

name: Super potion
description: Restores the HP of a POKéMON by 50 points.

name: Full heal
description: Heals all the status problems of one POKéMON.

name: Revive
description: Revives a fainted POKéMON with half its HP.

name: Max revive
description: Revives a fainted POKéMON with all its HP.

name: Fresh water
description: A mineral water that restores HP by 50 points.

name: Soda pop
description: A fizzy soda drink that restores HP by 60 points.

name: Lemonade
description: A very sweet drink that restores HP by 80 points.

name: Moomoo milk
description: A nutritious milk that restores HP by 100 points.

name: Energy powder
description: A bitter powder that restores HP by 50 points.

name: Energy root
description: A bitter root that restores HP by 200 points.

name: Heal powder
description: A bitter powder that heals all status problems.

name: Revival herb
description: A very bitter herb that revives a fainted POKéMON.

name: Ether
description: Restores the PP of a selected move by 10.

name: Max ether
description: Fully restores the PP of a selected move.

name: Elixir
description: Restores the PP of all moves by 10.

name: Max elixir
description: Fully restores the PP of a POKéMON’s moves.

name: Lava cookie
description: A local specialty that heals all status problems.

name: Berry juice
description: A 100% pure juice that restores HP by 20 points.

name: Sacred ash
description: Fully revives and restores all fainted POKéMON.

name: Hp up
description: Raises the HP of one POKéMON.

name: Protein
description: Raises the stat ATTACK of one POKéMON.

name: Iron
description: Raises the stat DEFENSE of one POKéMON.

name: Carbos
description: Raises the stat SPEED of one POKéMON.

name: Calcium
description: Raises the stat SP. ATK of one POKéMON.

name: Rare candy
description: Raises the level of a POKéMON by one.

name: Pp up
description: Raises the maximum PP of a selected move.

name: Zinc
description: Raises the base SP. DEF stat of one POKéMON.

name: Pp max
description: Raises the PP of a move to its maximum points.

name: Old gateau
description: Old Chateau’s hidden specialty. It heals all the status problems of a single Pokémon.

name: Guard spec.
description: Prevents stat reduction when used in battle.

name: Dire hit
description: Raises the critical-hit ratio during one battle.

name: X attack
description: Raises the stat ATTACK during one battle.

name: X defense
description: Raises the stat DEFENSE during one battle.

name: X speed
description: Raises the stat SPEED during one battle.

name: X accuracy
description: Raises accuracy of attack moves during one battle.

name: X sp. atk
description: Raises the stat SP. ATK during one battle.

name: X sp. def
description: An item that raises the Sp. Def stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: Poké doll
description: Use to flee from any battle with a wild POKéMON.

name: Fluffy tail
description: Use to flee from any battle with a wild POKéMON.

name: Blue flute
description: A glass flute that awakens sleeping POKéMON.

name: Yellow flute
description: A glass flute that snaps POKéMON out of confusion.

name: Red flute
description: A glass flute that snaps POKéMON out of attraction.

name: Black flute
description: A glass flute that keeps away wild POKéMON.

name: White flute
description: A glass flute that lures wild POKéMON.

name: Shoal salt
description: Salt obtained from deep inside the SHOAL CAVE.

name: Shoal shell
description: A seashell that you found inside Shoal Cave.

name: Red shard
description: A shard from an ancient item. Can be sold cheaply.

name: Blue shard
description: A shard from an ancient item. Can be sold cheaply.

name: Yellow shard
description: A shard from an ancient item. Can be sold cheaply.

name: Green shard
description: A shard from an ancient item. Can be sold cheaply.

name: Super repel
description: Repels weak wild POKéMON for 200 steps.

name: Max repel
description: Repels weak wild POKéMON for 250 steps.

name: Escape rope
description: Use to escape instantly from a cave or a dungeon.

name: Repel
description: Repels weak wild POKéMON for 100 steps.

name: Sun stone
description: Makes certain species of POKéMON evolve.

name: Moon stone
description: Makes certain species of POKéMON evolve.

name: Fire stone
description: Makes certain species of POKéMON evolve.

name: Thunder stone
description: Makes certain species of POKéMON evolve.

name: Water stone
description: Makes certain species of POKéMON evolve.

name: Leaf stone
description: Makes certain species of POKéMON evolve.

name: Tiny mushroom
description: A plain, ordinary mushroom. Can be sold cheaply.

name: Big mushroom
description: A rare mushroom that would sell at a high price.

name: Pearl
description: A pretty pearl. Can be sold cheaply.

name: Big pearl
description: A lovely large pearl that would sell at a high price.

name: Stardust
description: Beautiful red sand. Can be sold at a high price.

name: Star piece
description: A red gem shard. It would sell for a very high price.

name: Nugget
description: A nugget of pure gold. Can be sold at a high price.

name: Heart scale
description: A lovely scale. It is coveted by collectors.

name: Honey
description: A sweet honey with a lush aroma that attracts wild Pokémon when it is used in grass, caves, or on special trees.

name: Growth mulch
description: A plant fertilizer spread on soft soil. It speeds up the growth of Berries. However, it also dries the soil faster.

name: Damp mulch
description: A plant fertilizer spread on soft soil. It slows the growth of Berries and causes the soil to dry slower.

name: Stable mulch
description: A plant fertilizer spread on soft soil. It extends the time ripened Berries remain on their plants before falling.

name: Gooey mulch
description: A plant fertilizer spread on soft soil. It ups the number of times new plants grow where mature plants withered.

name: Root fossil
description: A fossil of an ancient, seafloor- dwelling POKéMON.

name: Claw fossil
description: A fossil of an ancient, seafloor- dwelling POKéMON.

name: Helix fossil
description: A piece of an ancient marine POKéMON’s seashell.

name: Dome fossil
description: A piece of an ancient marine POKéMON’s shell.

name: Old amber
description: A stone containing the genes of an ancient POKéMON.

name: Armor fossil
description: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that lived on the land. It appears to be part of a collar.

name: Skull fossil
description: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that lived on the land. It appears to be part of a head.

name: Rare bone
description: A bone that is extremely valuable for Pokémon archaeology. It can be sold for a high price to shops.

name: Shiny stone
description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It shines with a dazzling light.

name: Dusk stone
description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is as dark as dark can be.

name: Dawn stone
description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It sparkles like eyes.

name: Oval stone
description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is shaped like an egg.

name: Odd keystone
description: A vital item that is needed to keep a stone tower from collapsing. Voices can be heard from it occasionally.

name: Adamant orb
description: A brightly gleaming orb to be held by DIALGA. It boosts the power of Dragon-​ and Steel-type moves.

name: Lustrous orb
description: A beautifully glowing orb to be held by PALKIA. It boosts the power of Dragon-​ and Water-type moves.

name: Grass mail
description: Stationery featuring a print of a refreshingly green field. Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Flame mail
description: Stationery featuring a print of flames in blazing red. Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Bubble mail
description: Stationery featuring a print of a blue world underwater. Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Bloom mail
description: Stationery featuring a print of pretty floral patterns. Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Tunnel mail
description: Stationery featuring a print of a dimly lit coal mine. Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Steel mail
description: Stationery featuring a print of cool mechanical designs. Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Heart mail
description: Stationery featuring a print of giant heart patterns. Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Snow mail
description: Stationery featuring a print of a chilly, snow-covered world. Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Space mail
description: Stationery featuring a print depicting the huge expanse of space. Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Air mail
description: Stationery featuring a print of colorful letter sets. Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Mosaic mail
description: Stationery featuring a print of a vivid rainbow pattern. Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

name: Brick mail
description: Stationery featuring a print of a tough-looking brick pattern. Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

description: A hold item that heals paralysis in battle.

description: A hold item that awakens POKéMON in battle.

name: Pecha berry
description: A hold item that heals poisoning in battle.

name: Persim berry

name: Lum berry

name: Sitrus berry
description: A hold item that restores 30 HP in battle.

description: A hold item that restores HP but may confuse.

description: A hold item that restores HP but may confuse.

description: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow RABUTA.

name: Belue berry

description: A hold item that raises ATTACK in a pinch.

description: A hold item that ups the critical- hit rate in a pinch.

description: A hold item that sharply boosts a stat in a pinch.

name: Enigma berry
description: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow a mystery.

name: Micle berry
description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, it raises the accuracy of a move just once in a pinch.

name: Custap berry
description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, it gets to move first just once in a pinch.

name: Jaboca berry
description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, and if a foe’s physical attack lands, the foe also takes damage.

name: Rowap berry
description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, and if a foe’s special attack lands, the foe also takes damage.

name: Bright powder
description: A hold item that casts a glare to reduce accuracy.

name: White herb
description: A hold item that restores any lowered stat.

name: Macho brace
description: A hold item that promotes growth, but reduces SPEED.

name: Exp. share
description: A hold item that gets EXP. points from battles.

name: Quick claw
description: A hold item that occasionally allows the first strike.

name: Soothe bell
description: A hold item that calms spirits and fosters friendship.

name: Mental herb
description: A hold item that snaps POKéMON out of infatuation.

name: Choice band
description: Raises a move’s power, but permits only that move.

name: King’s rock
description: A hold item that may cause flinching when the foe is hit.

name: Silver powder
description: A hold item that raises the power of BUG-type moves.

name: Amulet coin
description: Doubles money in battle if the holder takes part.

name: Cleanse tag
description: A hold item that helps repel wild POKéMON.

name: Soul dew
description: Hold item: Raises SP. ATK & SP. DEF of LATIOS & LATIAS.

name: Deep sea tooth
description: A hold item that raises the SP. ATK of CLAMPERL.

name: Deep sea scale
description: A hold item that raises the SP. DEF of CLAMPERL.

name: Smoke ball
description: A hold item that can be used to flee from a wild POKéMON.

name: Everstone
description: A wondrous stone & a hold item that prevents evolution.

name: Focus band
description: A hold item that occasionally prevents fainting.

name: Lucky egg
description: A hold item that boosts EXP. points earned in battle.

name: Scope lens
description: A hold item that raises the critical- hit rate.

name: Metal coat
description: A hold item that raises the power of STEEL-type moves.

name: Leftovers
description: A hold item that gradually restores HP in battle.

name: Dragon scale
description: A strange scale held by DRAGON- type POKéMON.

name: Light ball
description: A hold item that raises the SP. ATK of PIKACHU.

name: Soft sand
description: A hold item that raises the power of GROUND-type moves.

name: Hard stone
description: A hold item that raises the power of ROCK-type moves.

name: Miracle seed
description: A hold item that raises the power of GRASS-type moves.

name: Black glasses
description: A hold item that raises the power of DARK-type moves.

name: Black belt
description: A hold item that boosts FIGHTING- type moves.

name: Magnet
description: A hold item that boosts ELECTRIC- type moves.

name: Mystic water
description: A hold item that raises the power of WATER-type moves.

name: Sharp beak
description: A hold item that raises the power of FLYING-type moves.

name: Poison barb
description: A hold item that raises the power of POISON-type moves.

name: Never Melt ice
description: A hold item that raises the power of ICE-type moves.

name: Spell tag
description: A hold item that raises the power of GHOST-type moves.

name: Twisted spoon
description: A hold item that boosts PSYCHIC- type moves.

name: Charcoal
description: A hold item that raises the power of FIRE-type moves.

name: Dragon fang
description: A hold item that raises the power of DRAGON-type moves.

name: Silk scarf
description: A hold item that raises the power of NORMAL-type moves.

name: Upgrade
description: A peculiar box made by SILPH CO.

name: Shell bell
description: A hold item that restores HP upon striking the foe.

name: Sea incense
description: A hold item that slightly boosts WATER-type moves.

name: Lax incense
description: A hold item that slightly lowers the foe’s accuracy.

name: Lucky punch
description: A hold item that raises CHANSEY’s critical-hit rate.

name: Metal powder
description: A hold item that raises DEFENSE.

name: Thick club
description: A bone of some sort. It can be sold cheaply.

name: Leek
description: A stick of leek. It can be sold cheaply.

name: Red scarf
description: A hold item that raises COOL in CONTESTS.

name: Blue scarf
description: A hold item that raises BEAUTY in CONTESTS.

name: Pink scarf
description: A hold item that raises CUTE in CONTESTS.

name: Green scarf
description: A hold item that raises SMART in CONTESTS.

name: Yellow scarf
description: A hold item that raises TOUGH in CONTESTS.

name: Wide lens
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a magnifying lens that slightly boosts the accuracy of moves.

name: Muscle band
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a headband that slightly boosts the power of physical moves.

name: Wise glasses
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a thick pair of glasses that slightly boosts the power of special moves.

name: Expert belt
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a well-worn belt that slightly boosts the power of supereffective moves.

name: Light clay
description: A Pokémon hold item that extends the duration of barrier moves like Light Screen and Reflect used by the holder.

name: Life orb
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the power of moves, but at the cost of some HP on each hit.

name: Power herb
description: A single-use item to be held by a Pokémon. It allows the immediate use of a move that charges on the first turn.

name: Toxic orb
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a bizarre orb that badly poisons the holder in battle.

name: Flame orb
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a bizarre orb that inflicts a burn on the holder in battle.

name: Quick powder
description: An item to be held by DITTO. Extremely fine yet hard, this odd powder boosts the Speed stat.

name: Focus sash
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If it has full HP, the holder will endure one potential KO attack, leaving 1 HP.

name: Zoom lens
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder moves after the foe, its critical-hit ratio will be boosted.

name: Metronome
description: A Pokémon hold item that boosts a move used consecutively. Its effect is reset if another move is used.

name: Iron ball
description: A Pokémon hold item that cuts Speed. It makes Flying-type and levitating holders susceptible to Ground moves.

name: Lagging tail
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is tremendously heavy and makes the holder move slower than usual.

name: Destiny knot
description: A long, thin, bright red string to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder becomes infatuated, the foe does too.

name: Black sludge
description: A hold item that gradually restores the HP of Poison-type Pokémon. It inflicts damage on all other types.

name: Icy rock
description: A Pokémon hold item that extends the duration of the move Hail used by the holder.

name: Smooth rock
description: A Pokémon hold item that extends the duration of the move Sandstorm used by the holder.

name: Heat rock
description: A Pokémon hold item that extends the duration of the move Sunny Day used by the holder.

name: Damp rock
description: A Pokémon hold item that extends the duration of the move Rain Dance used by the holder.

name: Grip claw
description: A Pokémon hold item that extends the duration of multiturn attacks like Bind and Wrap.

name: Choice scarf
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This scarf boosts Speed, but allows the use of only one kind of move.

name: Sticky barb
description: A hold item that damages the holder on every turn. It may latch on to foes that touch the holder.

name: Power bracer
description: A Pokémon hold item that promotes Attack gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

name: Power belt
description: A Pokémon hold item that promotes Defense gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

name: Power lens
description: A Pokémon hold item that promotes Sp. Atk gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

name: Power band
description: A Pokémon hold item that promotes Sp. Def gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

name: Power anklet
description: A Pokémon hold item that promotes Speed gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

name: Power weight
description: A Pokémon hold item that promotes HP gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

name: Shed shell

name: Big root
description: A Pokémon hold item that boosts the power of HP-stealing moves to let the holder recover more HP.

name: Choice specs
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These distinctive glasses boost Sp. Atk, but allow only one kind of move to be used.

name: Rock incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Rock-type moves.

name: Full incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that makes the holder bloated and slow moving.

name: Wave incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Water-type moves.

name: Rose incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Grass-type moves.

name: Luck incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It doubles a battle’s prize money if the holding Pokémon joins in.

name: Pure incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It helps keep wild Pokémon away if the holder is the first one in the party.

name: Protector
description: A protective item of some sort. It is extremely stiff and heavy. It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

name: Electirizer
description: A box packed with a tremendous amount of electric energy. It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

name: Magmarizer
description: A box packed with a tremendous amount of magma energy. It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

name: Dubious disc
description: A transparent device overflowing with dubious data. Its producer is unknown.

name: Reaper cloth
description: A cloth imbued with horrifyingly strong spiritual energy. It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

name: Razor claw
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a sharply hooked claw that ups the holder’s critical-hit ratio.

name: Razor fang
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It may cause the foe to flinch when the holder inflicts damage.

name: Tm01
description: Powerful, but makes the user flinch if hit by the foe.

name: Tm02
description: Hooks and slashes the foe with long, sharp claws.

name: Tm03
description: Generates an ultrasonic wave that may confuse.

name: Tm04
description: Raises SP. ATK and SP. DEF by focusing the mind.

name: Tm05
description: A savage roar that makes the foe flee  to end the battle.

name: Tm06
description: Poisons the foe with a toxin that gradually worsens.

name: Tm07
description: Summons a hailstorm that hurts all types except ICE.

name: Tm08
description: Bulks up the body to boost both ATTACK & DEFENSE.

name: Tm09
description: Shoots 2 to 5 seeds in a row to strike the foe.

name: Tm10
description: The attack power varies among different POKéMON.

name: Tm11
description: Raises the power of FIRE-type moves for 5 turns.

name: Tm12
description: Enrages the foe so it can only use attack moves.

name: Tm13
description: Fires an icy cold beam that may freeze the foe.

name: Tm14
description: A vicious snow-and- wind attack that may freeze the foe.

name: Tm15
description: Powerful, but needs recharging the next turn.

name: Tm16
description: Creates a wall of light that lowers SP. ATK damage.

name: Tm17
description: Negates all damage, but may fail if used in succession.

name: Tm18
description: Raises the power of WATER-type moves for 5 turns.

name: Tm19
description: Recovers half the HP of the damage  this move inflicts.

name: Tm20
description: Prevents status abnormality with a mystical power.

name: Tm21
description: The less the user likes you, the more powerful this move.

name: Tm22
description: Absorbs sunlight in the 1st turn, then attacks next turn.

name: Tm23
description: Slams the foe with a hard tail. It may lower DEFENSE.

name: Tm24
description: A powerful electric attack that may cause paralysis.

name: Tm25
description: Strikes the foe with a thunderbolt. It may paralyze.

name: Tm26
description: Causes a quake that has no effect on flying foes.

name: Tm27
description: The more the user likes you, the more powerful this move.

name: Tm28
description: Digs underground the 1st turn, then strikes next turn.

name: Tm29
description: A powerful psychic attack that may lower SP. DEF.

name: Tm30
description: Hurls a dark lump at the foe. It may lower SP. DEF.

name: Tm31
description: Destroys barriers like LIGHT SCREEN and causes damage.

name: Tm32
description: Creates illusory copies to enhance elusiveness.

name: Tm33
description: Creates a wall of light that weakens physical attacks.

name: Tm34
description: Zaps the foe with a jolt of electricity that never misses.

name: Tm35
description: Looses a stream of fire that may burn the foe.

name: Tm36
description: Hurls sludge at the foe. It may poison the foe.

name: Tm37
description: Causes a sandstorm that hits the foe over several turns.

name: Tm38
description: A powerful fire attack that may burn the foe.

name: Tm39
description: Stops the foe from moving with rocks. May lower SPEED.

name: Tm40
description: An extremely fast attack that can’t be avoided.

name: Tm41
description: Prevents the foe from using the same move in a row.

name: Tm42
description: Raises ATTACK when poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.

name: Tm43
description: Adds an effect to attack depending on the location.

name: Tm44
description: The user sleeps for 2 turns to restore health and status.

name: Tm45
description: Makes it tough to attack a foe of the opposite gender.

name: Tm46
description: While attacking, it may steal the foe’s held item.

name: Tm47
description: Spreads hard-edged wings and slams into the foe.

name: Tm48
description: Switches abilities with the foe on the turn this is used.

name: Tm49
description: Steals the effects of the move the foe is trying to use.

name: Tm50
description: Enables full-power attack, but sharply lowers SP. ATK.

name: Tm51
description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user’s HP by up to half of its top HP.

name: Tm52
description: The user attacks at full power. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat if it hits.

name: Tm53
description: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the foe. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

name: Tm54
description: A restrained attack that prevents the foe from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

name: Tm55
description: If the foe’s HP is down to under half, this attack will hit with double the power.

name: Tm56
description: The user flings its held item at the foe to attack. Its power and effects depend on the item.

name: Tm57
description: The user attacks with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.

name: Tm58
description: The user endures any attack, leaving 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Tm59
description: The foe is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user’s gaping mouth.

name: Tm60
description: An energy-draining punch. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: Tm61
description: The user shoots a sinister, bluish white flame at the foe to inflict a burn.

name: Tm62
description: The foe is attacked with powdery scales blown by wind. It may also raise all the user’s stats.

name: Tm63
description: It prevents the foe from using its held item. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.

name: Tm64
description: The user explodes to inflict damage on all Pokémon in battle. The user faints upon using this move.

name: Tm65
description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: Tm66
description: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user can use this attack after the foe, its power is doubled.

name: Tm67
description: The user recycles a single-use item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.

name: Tm68
description: The user charges the foe using every bit of its power. It must rest on the next turn to recover.

name: Tm69
description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. It sharply raises the Speed stat.

name: Tm70
description: The user flashes a light that cuts the foe’s accuracy. It can also be used to illuminate caves.

name: Tm71
description: The user stabs the foe with a sharpened stone from below. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: Tm72
description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the foe in the same turn.

name: Tm73
description: A weak electric charge is launched at the foe. It causes paralysis if it hits.

name: Tm74
description: The user tackles the foe from a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.

name: Tm75
description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. It sharply raises the user’s Attack stat.

name: Tm76
description: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the foe. The trap hurts foes that switch into battle.

name: Tm77
description: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the foe.

name: Tm78
description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe is charmed into sharply lowering its Sp. Atk stat.

name: Tm79
description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target flinch.

name: Tm80
description: Large boulders are hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It may also make the target flinch.

name: Tm81
description: The user slashes at the foe by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

name: Tm82
description: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.

name: Tm83
description: The user draws power from the Berry it is holding to attack. The Berry determines its type and power.

name: Tm84
description: The foe is stabbed with a tentacle or arm seeped with poison. It may also poison the foe.

name: Tm85
description: An attack that works only on a sleeping foe. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user’s HP.

name: Tm86
description: The user snares the foe with grass and trips it. The heavier the foe, the greater the damage.

name: Tm87
description: The user enrages the foe into confusion. However, it also sharply raises the foe’s Attack stat.

name: Tm88
description: The user pecks the foe. If the foe is holding a Berry, the user plucks it and gains its effect.

name: Tm89
description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: Tm90
description: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.

name: Tm91
description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it in one shot. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Tm92
description: The user creates a bizarre space in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

name: Hm01
description: Attacks the foe with sharp blades or claws.

name: Hm02
description: Flies up on the first turn, then attacks next turn.

name: Hm03
description: Creates a huge wave, then crashes it down on the foe.

name: Hm04
description: Builds enormous power, then slams the foe.

name: Hm05
description: Looses a powerful blast of light that reduces accuracy.

name: Hm06
description: A rock-crushingly tough attack that may lower DEFENSE.

name: Hm07
description: Attacks the foe with enough power to climb waterfalls.

name: Hm08
description: Dives underwater the 1st turn, then attacks next turn.
